snippet: The Hall of Fame jockey Gary Stevens won a race at Santa Anita in Arcadia, Calif., for his first victory in North America since 2005.
abstract: Jockey Gary Stevens wins race at Santa Anita in Arcadia, Calif, for his first victory since returning from retirement.
lead_paragraph: The Hall of Fame jockey Gary Stevens won a race at Santa Anita in Arcadia, Calif., for his first victory in North America since 2005.

headline.main: First Winner for Jockey Stevens Since ’05
